Html:
Is there a way to buy ARTag or ALVAR library??...ARTag library has expired on dec 31 and therefore i can not use the library for my thesis project. For trial version of ALVAR i have only 30 days to use it....

how can I do?

Thanks

Giacomo

ARTag does not have a license available as long as I know. Are you sure ALVAR non-commercial free version only have 30 days limit? I thought it had 1 year limit. 

Ohan

Hi

ARTag library has expired. but if you change the date of the computer, it can be used.

Seungjin

thanks for answers...

With basic version of alvar there is one year limit, but when I open my application that uses alvar library it says me:

Alvar Library 1.3.0 Copyright (c) VTT 2008-2010

Conpiled on Windows 5.1 x86 (Feb 5 2010)

Day 339/365 of usage period for this version.

On the website of alvar I have seen That there is also the 1.5.0 version with these features

  • added licensing system to disable time-bomb
  • refactored capturing system to actually allow for third party plugins
  • added a check that detects the presence of capture plugins and displays an appropriate error message in samples
  • documentation updates
  • fixed build system on Windows Vista
  • fixed bug in UKF implementation
  • fixed MultiMarker implementation to allow marker sets that do not contain id 0
  • fixed bug with distortion initialization in Camera class

we'll add AVLAR 1.5.0 support in the next release. For now, please use ALVAR 1.4.0 since it won't expire for a while.

Ohan
